page.title: 18WOMEN'S INSTITUTE: QUINTON
page.content: Quinton and Admington Women's Institute meet once in each month. Activities are many and varied, including quizzes, games, skittles, bingo, lectures, demonstrations and outings. These have included trips to theatres, factories and other local W.I. groups. Ten years ago, the W.I.was involved in its own national Domesday survey, & the findings were published in 1980. Each year, this group also raise funds in support of two charities. Further activities include the entertainment of hospital patients, pork-pie making, weight-watching, heraldry, silk flower making, journalism, cookery, baking and discussion. Representatives from Quinton attend the annual, national W.I. meetings.
